backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with storage, authorization, file/note/mission types, state maps, and health/diagnostic query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides a mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions summarizing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documents the creation and verification of a frontend baseline identical to Live version 114, outlining parity checks and change control.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template configuring PWA metadata, icons, service worker registration, and app bootstrap.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Declares a post-restore change freeze, detailing prohibited and permitted actions until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, display settings, and categories for MyGallery.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, network-first navigation, and bounded runtime caching.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Checklist and guidance for verifying PWA installability requirements including manifest, icons, service worker, and testing steps.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming all frontend files and behaviors match Live version 114 with verified authentication, UI components, and utilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app wrapper using theme, actor, and upload providers with intro-screen logic tied to authentication state.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: Displays detailed initialization errors with retry, logout, and expandable technical details based on error classification.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated crosshair-style SVG icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Shows a fixed decorative bottom line with theme-based styling.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog warning users when a file cannot open in a new window and offering retry or download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Displays previews for various file types and provides actions like open, download, move, or delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles uploading files, links, and notes with progress tracking, speech-to-text input, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating folders button that triggers folder UI and supports disabled and overlay states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated dialog for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders with swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Manages full‑screen folder list with create, rename, delete, and select actions using backend mutations and swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Displays files in a full‑screen modal with swipe navigation, delete, share, download, and move actions.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Shows files and notes in a grid with selection, long‑press, preview, and bulk actions, using multiple data queries.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, sign‑out menu, and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Splash screen showing an animated icon and fading out before signaling completion.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link can't open externally, offering retry and copy options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button to trigger Internet Identity login with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission detail view with title editing, task management, autosave, and file/note previews.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions, allowing title entry and task management with create mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions view with hover and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full‑screen mission list with filtering, swipe interactions, mission detail navigation, and create/delete handling.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper enforcing a mobile‑only layout container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for selecting a mission to move files or notes into, with mutation handling and feedback.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog to view, share, download, or delete a note, with optional actions for sending to folder or mission.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files or notes to a folder or back to main, with mutation handling and performance diagnostics.
Swipeable row component enabling edit/delete actions with drag gestures and controlled open state.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a global upload progress bar using UploadContext when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with a target-themed SVG and welcome text plus a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages backend actor initialization with retries, error handling, and identity-based state.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Provides upload state management with progress tracking, batching, and legacy API support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor via react-query, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, files, missions, and notes once when the backend actor becomes ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient creation, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer (touch) and updates on pointer type changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Implements debounced autosaving for mission edits with change detection, mission switching handling, and queued save logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions using the backend actor with identity checks and targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and deleting notes across folders and missions, with concurrency limits and selective cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for files and folders, supporting listing, fetching by folder or mission, and creating folders with upload concurrency limits.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Custom React hook wrapping Web SpeechRecognition with continuous/interim transcription, error handling, and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind entry file defining light/dark theme CSS variables, layout rules, and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry rendering React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main home page managing authentication state, data fetching, UI panels, and dev-only smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Helpers and constants for classifying actor initialization errors and extracting messaging details.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Utilities for opening external URLs, downloading files, and sharing content via Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Logic determining how files open (viewer, office preview, or download) based on MIME type.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Provides functions to determine previewability, categorize MIME types, and generate human-readable file-type labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Calculates mission progress, checks if missions are completed, and splits missions into completed and incomplete groups.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares two task arrays safely with BigInt IDs by checking each field manually.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements an optional performance diagnostics tool to time operations and log durations when enabled.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs mission mutation lifecycle events to the console in development mode for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development-only backend smoke tests for core flows and formats the results for display.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple promise-based concurrency limiter for controlled parallel execution.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including session storage support and hash-based routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical inventory of all frontend files defining the v114 baseline for drift detection and Draft sync validation.
project_state.json: Defines project state, required fixes, and known issues related to immediate UI updates when moving files between collections.
